Write-Up Text: Aussie people are sounding off on social media in regards to government affairs. Plenty of buzz surrounds the national budget as the topic of policy reform is widely discussed. From welfare policies to superannuation provisions Aussies have much to say. With environmental and economic issues at stake it's crucial to prioritize the less fortunate while addressing structural concerns that affect many across the country. The stage is set for change but the key issue remains how to execute such goals without controversy from the usually vociferous online community. #Australia #Government #Budget #PolicyReform
